001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.common;
003
004import java.math.BigDecimal;
005import java.math.RoundingMode;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009import javax.money.*;
010import javax.money.Monetary;
011
012import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.TaxedItemPrice;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.tax_category.TaxRate;
014import com.commercetools.money.MonetaryProvider;
015import com.commercetools.money.MonetarySupplier;
016
017import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.DefaultRoundingProvider;
018
019/**
020 * Utility methods to convert from {@link MonetaryAmount} to {@link Money} and vice versa
021 */
022public class MoneyUtil {
023    private static final MonetaryProvider MONETARY_PROVIDER;
024    protected static final DefaultRoundingProvider ROUNDING_PROVIDER = new DefaultRoundingProvider();
025
026    static {
027        MONETARY_PROVIDER = MonetarySupplier.instance();
028    }
029
030    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final Money money) {
031        if (money instanceof TypedMoneyDraft) {
032            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoneyDraft) money);
033        }
034        if (money instanceof TypedMoney) {
035            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoney) money);
036        }
037        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(), Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode()));
038    }
039
040    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoneyDraft money) {
041        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) {
042            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
043        }
044        return toMonetaryAmount((CentPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
045    }
046
047    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
048        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
049        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
050            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
051    }
052
053    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
054        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
055        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
056    }
057
058    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoney money) {
059        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoney) {
060            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoney) money);
061        }
062        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
063        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
064            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
065    }
066
067    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoney money) {
068        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
069        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
070            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
071    }
072
073    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoney money) {
074        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
075        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
076    }
077
078    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final String currency) {
079        return zeroAmount(Monetary.getCurrency(currency));
080    }
081
082    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final CurrencyUnit currency) {
083        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(0, currency);
084    }
085
086    public static CentPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
087        return CentPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
088                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
089                .fractionDigits(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getDefaultFractionDigits())
090                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
091                .build();
092    }
093
094    public static HighPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
095        return HighPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
096                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
097                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
098                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
099                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
100                .build();
101    }
102
103    public static CentPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
104        return CentPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
105                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
106                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
107                .build();
108    }
109
110    public static HighPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
111        return HighPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
112                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
113                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
114                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
115                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
116                .build();
117    }
118
119    public static long amountToCents(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
120        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
121            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
122        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount).longValue());
123    }
124
125    public static long amountToPreciseAmount(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
126        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
127            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
128        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits).longValue());
129    }
130
131    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount) {
132        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
133        final CurrencyUnit cur = amount.getCurrency();
134        final BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber()
135                .numberValue(BigDecimal.class)
136                .setScale(Math.max(0, cur.getDefaultFractionDigits()), RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
137        return number.scaleByPowerOfTen(number.scale());
138    }
139
140    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount, final int fractionsDigit) {
141        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
142        final BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber()
143                .numberValue(BigDecimal.class)
144                .setScale(Math.max(0, fractionsDigit), RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
145        return number.scaleByPowerOfTen(number.scale());
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Calculates the taxes applied to the pricing.
150     * @param taxedPrice the items taxed price
151     * @return the monetary amount
152     */
153    public static MonetaryAmount calculateAppliedTaxes(final TaxedItemPrice taxedPrice) {
154        return taxedPrice.getTotalGross().subtract(taxedPrice.getTotalNet());
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Calculates the gross price of the given amount according to its tax rate.
159     * Whether the provided amount is already gross or net is determined by the tax rate.
160     * @param amount the monetary amount
161     * @param taxRate the tax rate used for calculating the gross price
162     * @return the monetary amount
163     */
164    public static MonetaryAmount calculateGrossPrice(final MonetaryAmount amount, final TaxRate taxRate) {
165        return taxRate.getIncludedInPrice() ? amount : convertNetToGrossPrice(amount, taxRate.getAmount());
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * Calculates the net price of the given amount according to its tax rate.
170     * Whether the provided amount is already net or gross is determined by the tax rate.
171     * @param amount the monetary amount
172     * @param taxRate the tax rate corresponding to the {@code amount}
173     * @return the net monetary amount
174     */
175    public static MonetaryAmount calculateNetPrice(final MonetaryAmount amount, final TaxRate taxRate) {
176        return taxRate.getIncludedInPrice() ? convertGrossToNetPrice(amount, taxRate.getAmount()) : amount;
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Converts the given net amount (i.e. without taxes) to gross (i.e. with taxes included) according to the provided tax rate.
181     * @param netAmount the net monetary amount
182     * @param taxRate the given tax rate, e.g. {@code 0.19} for 19% tax
183     * @return the gross monetary amount
184     */
185    public static MonetaryAmount convertNetToGrossPrice(final MonetaryAmount netAmount, final double taxRate) {
186        return netAmount.multiply(1 + taxRate);
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Converts the given gross amount (i.e. with taxes included) to net (i.e. without taxes) according to the provided tax rate.
191     * @param grossAmount the gross monetary amount
192     * @param taxRate the given tax rate, e.g. {@code 0.19} for 19% tax
193     * @return the net monetary amount
194     */
195    public static MonetaryAmount convertGrossToNetPrice(final MonetaryAmount grossAmount, final double taxRate) {
196        return grossAmount.divide(1 + taxRate);
197    }
198}
